Package at.fhj.iit.custom.cashRegister

Class CashRegisterManagement

java.lang.Object
at.fhj.iit.custom.cashRegister.CashRegisterManagement
public class CashRegisterManagement extends Object
Represents an inventory of a certain DrinkSale history. Next to managing the sales history (in this case only additions are allowed), there is also the possibility to retrieve and print reports from sales history.
Version:
3.0
Author:
Andreas Steirer

    Initialisation of the DrinkSale history.

    Initialisation of the DrinkSale history, with an already available history.

      Parameters:
      drinkSales - specific DrinkSale entries

    • retrieveTotalOfNonAlcoholicBeverages

      public double retrieveTotalOfNonAlcoholicBeverages()
      Retrieves the total of all non alcoholic Drinks from the current DrinkSale history.
      Returns:
      the total of all non alcoholic Drink sales

    • retrieveTotalOfAlcoholicBeveragesWeak

      public double retrieveTotalOfAlcoholicBeveragesWeak()
      Retrieves the total of all weak alcoholic Drinks from the current DrinkSale history.
      Returns:
      the total of all weak alcoholic Drink sales

      Returns:
      the total of all intense alcoholic Drink sales

    • retrieveTotalByDate

      public double retrieveTotalByDate​(LocalDate soldAt)
      Retrieves the total of all Drinks by a certain date from the current DrinkSale history.
      Parameters:
      soldAt - a certain date / day on which the sale occurred
      Returns:
      the total of all Drink sales on the passed date

    • retrieveTotalByOperator

      public double retrieveTotalByOperator​(Operator soldBy)
      Retrieves the total of all Drinks sold by a specific Operator from the current DrinkSale history.
      Parameters:
      soldBy - a certain Operator who achieved the sale
      Returns:
      the total of all Drink sales for the passed Operator

    • retrieveTotalByDateAndOperator

      public double retrieveTotalByDateAndOperator​(LocalDate soldAt, Operator soldBy)
      Retrieves the total of all Drinks sold at a specific date and by a specific Operator from the current DrinkSale history.
      Parameters:
      soldAt - a certain date / day on which the sale occurred
      soldBy - a certain Operator who achieved the sale
      Returns:
      the total of all Drink sales for the passed date and Operator

    • retrieveTotal

      public double retrieveTotal()
      Retrieves the total of all Drinks sold from the current DrinkSale history.
      Returns:
      the total of all Drink sales

    • printOperators

      public void printOperators​(LocalDate date, String soldBy)
      Prints the total of all Drinks by a specific Operator (and possibly at a specific date) from the current DrinkSale history.
      Parameters:
      date - a certain date / day on which the sale occurred, if null overall sales by a Operator gets printed
      soldBy - a certain Operator who achieved the sale. if all all sales from each operator are printed

    • printDateOrNoDate

      public void printDateOrNoDate​(LocalDate date, Operator soldBy)
      Prints the total of all Drinks sold by a specific Operator (and possibly at a specific date) from the current DrinkSale history.
      Parameters:
      date - a certain date / day on which the sale occurred, if null overall sales by a Operator gets printed
      soldBy - a certain Operator who achieved the sales

    • printTotal

      public void printTotal​(LocalDate date)
      Prints the total of all Drinks (possibly at a specific date) from the current DrinkSale history.
      Parameters:
      date - a certain date / day on which the sale occurred, if null all-time sales gets printed

    • printNonAlcoholic

      public void printNonAlcoholic()
      Prints the total of all non alcoholic Drinks from the current DrinkSale history.

    • printAlcoholicIntense

      public void printAlcoholicIntense()
      Prints the total of all intense alcoholic Drinks from the current DrinkSale history.

    • printAlcoholicWeak

      public void printAlcoholicWeak()
      Prints the total of all weak alcoholic Drinks from the current DrinkSale history.
